name: Makerdo Inc
description: Developer of an online payment tool intended to create forms that accept recurring and single payments. The company's platform includes customization, multi-currency support, and secure integration with payment gateways as well as offers a free subscription that involves a per-transaction commission and a monthly paid subscription with no commission, enabling entrepreneurs and businesses to sell services and digital content online easily.
one_liner: Developer of an online payment tool intended to create forms that accept recurring and single payments. The company's platform includes customization, multi-currency support, and secure integration with payment gateways as well as offers a free subscription that involves a per-transaction commission and a monthly paid subscription with no commission, enabling entrepreneurs and businesses to sell services and digital content online easily.
